This is the R setup file for blouchOU_v1.stan It includes the function sigma.X.estimate, taken from the R Pacakge Slouch (Kopperud et al. 2020).

Source: R/blouchOU.setup.v1.R, R/blouchOUPredict.setup.v1.R
sigma.X.estimate.Rd

This is the R setup file for blouchOU_v1.stan It includes the function sigma.X.estimate, taken from the R Pacakge Slouch (Kopperud et al. 2020).

This is the R setup file for blouchOUPredict_v1.stan It includes the function sigma.X.estimate, taken from the R Pacakge Slouch (Kopperud et al. 2020).

# S3 method for X.estimate
sigma(phy, ta, predictor, mv.predictor)

# S3 method for X.estimate
sigma(phy, ta, predictor, mv.predictor)

Arguments

trdata

Data formatted by make.treedata function from the R Pacakge treeplyr - only extant species

trdata.fos

Data formatted by make.treedata function from the R Pacakge treeplyr - extant and fossil

names.traits

Vector of trait names

classical

Numeric denoting whether classical regression (=1) or inverse regression (=0) should be used in prediction

Value

An object of class list for use in blouchOU_v1.stan An object of class list for use in blouchOU_v1.stan
